titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a bill to amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to revise the date of the final order of the President for fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-451.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/19/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of a bill amending the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) with respect to final order and report dates.
